Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: The 2023 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the “Annual Meeting”) of Apple Inc. (“Apple”) was held on March 10, 2023. At the Annual Meeting, Apple’s shareholders voted on the following nine proposals and cast their votes as described below.

subsections.Proposal 2: Ratification of Independent:
A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as Apple’s independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2023 was approved.

For           | Against     | Abstained
--------------|-------------|------------
12,569,833,138| 154,378,601 | 35,722,731
subsections.Proposal 3: Advisory Resolution to Appro:
An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved.

For           | Against       | Abstained  | Broker Non-Vote
--------------|---------------|------------|----------------
8,450,622,819 | 1,037,238,044 | 72,364,102 | 3,199,709,505
subsections.Proposal 4: Advisory Vote on the Frequen:
A majority of shareholders voted for 1 Year on an advisory vote on the frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation.

1 Year        | 2 Years    | 3 Years     | Abstained
--------------|------------|-------------|------------
9,373,118,972 | 30,603,953 | 122,956,354 | 33,545,686

Based on these results, and consistent with the recommendation of Apple’s board of directors (the “Board”), the Board has determined that Apple will hold an advisory vote on executive compensation every year.
subsections.Proposal 5: Shareholder Proposal - Civil:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Civil Rights and Non-Discrimination Audit Proposal” was not approved.

For         | Against       | Abstained   | Broker Non-Vote
------------|---------------|-------------|----------------
132,449,397 | 9,322,879,571 | 104,895,997 | 3,199,709,505
subsections.Proposal 6: Shareholder Proposal - Commu:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Communist China Audit” was not approved.

For         | Against       | Abstained   | Broker Non-Vote
------------|---------------|-------------|----------------
413,232,649 | 9,001,346,586 | 145,645,730 | 3,199,709,505
subsections.Proposal 7: Shareholder Proposal on Boar:
A shareholder proposal on Board policy for communication with shareholder proponents was not approved.

For         | Against       | Abstained  | Broker Non-Vote
------------|---------------|------------|----------------
611,602,995 | 8,865,309,276 | 83,312,694 | 3,199,709,505
subsections.Proposal 8: Shareholder Proposal - Racia:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Racial and Gender Pay Gaps” was not approved.

For           | Against       | Abstained   | Broker Non-Vote
--------------|---------------|-------------|----------------
3,186,369,941 | 6,227,476,677 | 146,378,347 | 3,199,709,505
subsections.Proposal 9: Shareholder Proposal - Share:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Shareholder Proxy Access Amendments” was not approved.

For           | Against       | Abstained  | Broker Non-Vote
--------------|---------------|------------|----------------
2,934,328,973 | 6,535,240,600 | 90,655,392 | 3,199,709,505
